description: An ancient settlement in northwest Jordan (modern Amman) received a Macedonian settlement and the name of Philadelphia from Ptolemy II Philadelphos (285-246 BC).

properties.title: OSM location of Temple of Hercules

improved description; corrected erroneous TM Geo ID.

locations.details: Amman's Citadel Hill has a long history of occupation, beginning in the Neolithic period.
